TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NotificationsSendingHandler(PSContextInfo contextInfo, NotificationsPreSendEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NotificationsSendingHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NotificationsSendingHandler(contextInfo As PSContextInfo, e As NotificationsPreSendEventArgs)
public delegate void NotificationsSendingHandler(PSContextInfo ^ contextInfo, NotificationsPreSendEventArgs ^ e);
type NotificationsSendingHandler = delegate of PSContextInfo * NotificationsPreSendEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: Event arguments for the OnSending pre-event.
Docs.summary: Event handler for the Notifications Sending pre-event.

remarks.para: For an example that changes e-mail by using the Notifications Sending event, see How to: Customize E-Mail for Project Server Notifications.
